articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Apple services including App Store resume after outage for second straight day
articles.description: The outage on Monday affected 11 of Apple's services, including Arcade and Maps.
articles.content: Apple Inc's Apple Music, mobile App Store and Podcasts resumed services on Tuesday, after facing outages for a second consecutive day, according to the company's system status page.

articles.description:

articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday had a phone call with his UK counterpart The Rt Hon Boris Johnson MP. Both the leaders had a detailed discussion on the situation in Ukraine.
